Source.Name: simple-audio-player
Source.Summary: Two small programs are available:Simple Audio Player and Simple Audio Browser
Source.Description: Two small programs are available: SimpleAudioPlayers main task is quick and easy open some music files selected by a filemanager.It uses very little memory. With SimpleAudioBrowser, you can easily and quickly search for music files. These can then be played back with a simple mouse click in SimpleAudioPlayer. Features: - Supported formats: Mp3, ogg, wav, flac and so on, audio cds and Internet radios. - Datastreams of internet radios can be recorded
